author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

If a plugin is loaded as a cfi is being written, the Listener must still be around (since there is no way to unattach from a Signal).

This fixes the segmentation fault seen in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/47275#issuecomment-3325515235

#### PR validation:

The edmWriteConfigs no longer crashes in the case described.

resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1583
title: Fix lifetime issue found in edmWriteConfigs
